mapper.select: SELECT esb.ORGANIZATION_ID, esb.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, esb.WIP_SUPPLY_SUBINVENTORY FROM sync_egp_system_items_b esb, sync_inv_secondary_inventories isi WHERE 1 = 1 --AND PLANNING_MAKE_BUY_CODE = 1 AND esb.ORGANIZATION_ID = 300000004669869 AND esb.WIP_SUPPLY_SUBINVENTORY = isi.SECONDARY_INVENTORY_NAME AND esb.ORGANIZATION_ID = isi.ORGANIZATION_ID AND GETDATE() > isnull(isi.DISABLE_DATE, GETDATE()) AND esb.WIP_SUPPLY_SUBINVENTORY IS NOT NULL

SELECT list.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, list.ORGANIZATION_ID, list.buyer_name FROM pes_item_num_buyer_list list
and list.LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= #{startUpdateDate} and list.LAST_UPDATE_DATE < #{endUpdateDate}

SELECT osp.inventory_item_id, osp.organization_id, osp.p_item_number as item_number, isnull(osp.usage_rate_f, 0) AS usage_rate_f, isnull(osp.usage_rate_s, 0) AS usage_rate_s, esb.ATTRIBUTE8, esb.ATTRIBUTE9 FROM pes_wie_work_orders_ops_item_erp osp LEFT JOIN sync_egp_system_items_b esb ON ( osp.organization_id = esb.ORGANIZATION_ID AND osp.inventory_item_id = esb.inventory_item_id ) WHERE isnull(osp.usage_rate_f, 0) > 0 and isnull(osp.usage_rate_f, 0) <> isnull(esb.ATTRIBUTE8, 0) and osp.organization_id in (300000004669879,300000004669869)

SELECT ist.item_number, (case when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'BCP' then 'AA半成品' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'CHO' then 'AA配置件' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'FG' then 'AA可售成品' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'FYWL' and list.item_number like 'A97%' then 'AA外协费用物料' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'FYWL' and list.item_number not like 'A97%' then 'AA费用物料' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'OP' then 'AA外协费用物料' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'P' then 'AA采购件' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'PLA' then 'AA平台模型物料' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'RJ' then 'AA内部软件' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'WBRJ' then 'AA外购软件' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'WWBCP' then 'AA委外半成品' when list.ITEM_TYPE = 'XSJ' then 'AA虚设件' ELSE null end) as ITEM_TYPE
FROM item_status_test ist, sync_items_num_des_list list WHERE ist.item_number = list.ITEM_NUMBER AND list.ORGANIZATION_ID = 300000004669869 AND list.INVENTORY_ITEM_STATUS_CODE = 'Inactive'
